sourceString: The virus was officially named the SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).
targetString: Virus ini secara resmi diberi nama koronavirus SARS (SARS-CoV).

sourceString: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
targetString: Lebih dari 8.000 orang terinfeksi, sekitar sepuluh persen di antaranya meninggal.

sourceString: In September 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called Novel Coronavirus 2012, and now officially named Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Pada September 2012, koronavirus jenis baru diidentifikasi, awalnya disebut Koronavirus Baru 2012, dan sekarang secara resmi diberi nama koronavirus sindrom pernapasan Timur Tengah (MERS-CoV).

sourceString: The World Health Organization issued a global alert soon after.
targetString: Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia mengeluarkan peringatan global segera setelah itu.

sourceString: The WHO update on 28 September 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
targetString: Pembaruan WHO pada 28 September 2012 mengatakan virus tersebut tampaknya tidak mudah menular dari orang ke orang.

sourceString: However, on 12 May 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in France was confirmed by the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
targetString: Namun, pada 12 Mei 2013, satu kasus penularan manusia-ke-manusia di Prancis dikonfirmasi oleh Kementerian Sosial dan Kesehatan Prancis.

sourceString: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the Ministry of Health in Tunisia.
targetString: Selain itu, kasus penularan manusia-ke-manusia dilaporkan oleh Kementerian Kesehatan di Tunisia.

sourceString: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Dua kasus terkonfirmasi melibatkan orang-orang yang tampaknya tertular penyakit dari almarhum ayah mereka, yang sakit setelah berkunjung ke Qatar dan Arab Saudi.

sourceString: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
targetString: Meskipun demikian, tampaknya virus ini sulit menyebar dari manusia ke manusia karena kebanyakan orang yang terinfeksi tidak menularkan virus.

sourceString: The final name for the virus is Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Nama akhir untuk virus ini adalah koronavirus sindrom pernapasan Timur Tengah (MERS-CoV).

sourceString: The only U.S. cases (both survived) were recorded in May 2014.In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in the Republic of Korea, when a man who had traveled to the Middle East, visited four hospitals in the Seoul area to treat his illness.
targetString: Hanya ada dua kasus di AS (keduanya selamat), yang dicatat pada Mei 2014.Pada Mei 2015, wabah MERS-CoV terjadi di Republik Korea ketika seorang pria, yang telah melakukan perjalanan ke Timur Tengah, mengunjungi empat rumah sakit di daerah Seoul untuk mengobati penyakitnya.

sourceString: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV outside the Middle East.
targetString: Wabah ini menyebabkan salah satu wabah MERS-CoV terbesar di luar Timur Tengah.

sourceString: As of December 2019, 2,468 cases of MERS-CoV infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
targetString: Pada Desember 2019, 2.468 kasus infeksi MERS-CoV dikonfirmasi melalui tes laboratorium, 851 di antaranya fatal, angka mortalitas sekitar 34,5%.

sourceString: In December 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in Wuhan, China.
targetString: Pada Desember 2019, wabah pneumonia dilaporkan di Wuhan, Tiongkok.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-nCoV by the World Health Organization (WHO), later renamed SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses.
targetString: Pada 31 Desember 2019, wabah ini ditelusuri ke galur koronavirus baru, yang diberi nama sementara 2019-nCoV oleh Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia (WHO), lalu diganti namanya menjadi SARS-CoV-2 oleh Komite Internasional Taksonomi Virus.

sourceString: Some researchers have suggested the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.As of 17 April 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
targetString: Beberapa peneliti menyatakan bahwa Pasar Grosir Makanan Laut Huanan mungkin bukan sumber asal penularan virus ke manusia. Hingga 17 April 2020, setidaknya ada 153.822 kematian terkonfirmasi dan lebih dari 2.240.191 kasus terkonfirmasi dalam pandemi pneumonia koronavirus ini.

sourceString: The Wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of Betacoronavirus from group 2B with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the SARS-CoV.
targetString: Galur Wuhan diidentifikasi sebagai galur Betacoronavirus baru dari grup 2B dengan kesamaan genetik sekitar 70% dengan SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
targetString: Virus ini memiliki kesamaan genetik 96% dengan koronavirus kelelawar sehingga banyak yang menduga virus ini berasal dari kelelawar juga.

sourceString: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
targetString: Pandemi ini telah mengakibatkan pembatasan perjalanan dan karantina wilayah tingkat nasional di beberapa negara.

sourceString: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
targetString: Koronavirus telah diketahui sebagai penyebab kondisi patologis dalam kedokteran hewan sejak tahun 1930-an.

sourceString: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
targetString: Kecuali bronkitis menular pada unggas, penyakit-penyakit utama yang terkait kebanyakan berlokasi di usus.

sourceString: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
targetString: Koronavirus terutama menginfeksi saluran pernapasan bagian atas dan saluran gastrointestinal mamalia dan unggas.

sourceString: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
targetString: Koronavirus juga menyebabkan berbagai penyakit pada hewan ternak dan peliharaan, beberapa di antaranya bisa serius dan merupakan ancaman bagi industri pertanian.

sourceString: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
targetString: Pada ayam, virus bronkitis menular (IBV), yang adalah koronavirus, menargetkan bukan hanya saluran pernapasan, tetapi juga saluran urogenital.

sourceString: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
targetString: Virus ini dapat menyebar ke berbagai organ di seluruh tubuh ayam.

sourceString: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
targetString: Pada hewan ternak, koronavirus yang signifikan secara ekonomi mencakup koronavirus babi (koronavirus gastroenteritis dapat menular, TGE) dan koronavirus sapi, yang keduanya mengakibatkan diare pada hewan muda.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
targetString: Koronavirus kucing: ada dua bentuk, koronavirus enterik kucing adalah patogen dengan signifikansi klinis kecil, tetapi mutasi spontan virus ini dapat mengakibatkan peritonitis menular felina (FIP), penyakit yang dikaitkan dengan mortalitas yang tinggi.

sourceString: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
targetString: Begitu pula, ada dua jenis koronavirus yang menginfeksi ferret: koronavirus enterik ferret menyebabkan sindrom gastrointestinal yang dikenal sebagai enteritis kataral epizootik (ECE), dan versi virus sistemik yang lebih mematikan (seperti FIP pada kucing) yang dikenal sebagai koronavirus sistemik ferret (FSC).

sourceString: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
targetString: Ada dua jenis koronavirus anjing (CCoV), satu koronavirus menyebabkan penyakit gastrointestinal ringan dan satu lagi diketahui menyebabkan penyakit pernapasan.

sourceString: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
targetString: Virus hepatitis mencit (MHV) adalah koronavirus yang menyebabkan penyakit murin epidemik dengan mortalitas tinggi, terutama di antara koloni mencit laboratorium.

sourceString: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
targetString: Virus sialodakrioadenitis (SDAV) adalah koronavirus yang sangat menular pada tikus laboratorium, yang dapat ditularkan di antara tikus melalui kontak langsung dan secara tidak langsung melalui aerosol.

sourceString: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
targetString: Beberapa galur MHV menyebabkan ensefalitis demielinasi progresif pada mencit yang telah digunakan sebagai model murin untuk sklerosis multipel.

sourceString: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
targetString: Upaya penelitian yang signifikan telah difokuskan untuk menjelaskan patogenesis koronavirus hewan ini, terutama oleh ahli virus yang tertarik pada kedokteran hewan dan penyakit zoonotik.

sourceString: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
targetString: Koronavirus babi (koronavirus gastroenteritis dapat menular pada babi, TGEV).

sourceString: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
targetString: Koronavirus sapi (BCV) menyebabkan enteritis profusi berat pada anak sapi.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
targetString: Koronavirus kucing (FCoV) menyebabkan enteritis ringan pada kucing dan juga Peritonitis menular felina berat (varian lain dari virus yang sama).

sourceString: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
targetString: dua jenis koronavirus anjing (CCoV) (satu koronavirus menyebabkan enteritis, satu lagi ditemukan di penyakit pernapasan).

sourceString: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
targetString: Koronavirus kalkun (TCV) menyebabkan enteritis pada kalkun.

sourceString: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
targetString: Koronavirus enterik ferret menyebabkan enteritis kataral epizootik pada ferret.

sourceString: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
targetString: Koronavirus sistemik ferret menyebabkan sindrom sistemik mirip-FIP pada ferret.

sourceString: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
targetString: Koronavirus enterik kelinci menyebabkan penyakit gastrointestinal akut dan diare pada kelinci muda Eropa.

sourceString: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
targetString: Virus diare epidemik babi (PED atau PEDV) merebak di seluruh dunia.
